# Objective


# Background

## End-Point PCR

::: {#fig-ep-pcr layout-ncol="2"}
![](EP PCR Gel Results 12_18_23 -1.jpg)

![](EP PCR Gel Results 12_18_23 -2.jpg)

EP-PCR conducted to confirm correct size of amplicon products. In this PCR reaction run, primer sets were at a concentration of 5 uM and the reagent used was SYBR PowerTrack. Note this is different than what was used for the 1:10 dilution series relative standard curves. 
:::

## Primers

## qPCR Reaction Information

| **Component**                                        | **per 1 rxn (uL)** |
|------------------------------------------------------|--------------------|
| Applied Biosystems™ Power SYBR™ Green PCR Master Mix | 5                  |
| Nuclease-free water                                  | 3.5                |
| Forward Primer                                       | 0.25               |
| Reverse Primer                                       | 0.25               |
| cDNA                                                 | 1                  |
| **Total**                                            | **10**             |
